metadata.title: What Noise Countermeasures Does Renesas CTSU2 Use?

sections.content:
Question:
What Noise Countermeasures Does Renesas CTSU2 Use?
Answer:
CTSU2 is equipped with the following noise suppression measures
Multi-frequency measurement
The CTSU2 can measure at up to four different sensor drive frequencies to avoid synchronization noise.
This module measures at three frequencies that allow majority decision by default, and standardizes the obtained results at the three frequencies to the first frequency reference value and determines the measurement value by majority decision.
Active shielding
To shield external influences while minimizing the increase in parasitic capacitance, a shield signal in phase with the sensor drive pulse is output from the shield and non-measurement terminals.
This function is available only for self-capacitance measurement.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
